name: CORE Lite - Design System Starter Kit
description:
The best Design Systems start with Core

Build a robust and scalable Design System now with Core, the Design System Starter Kit.


Meet Core

Core doesn’t include 100+ predefined pages and components, but a rock solid and simple start to let you build your unique Design System. Easy and fast!


What's inside?

The goal of Core is to give you all the tools you need to build your very unique Design System. From Logo, Type, Colors, Components, Documenation. And it is continuously updated with new features.

  • Simple & scalable: Everything is made in a way that you can start fast and stay in control of every part of your Design System.
  • 100& customizable: Core doesn’t try to do everything, but try to do the right thing. You will be able to create your own components based on examples.
  • Organized structure: Thanks to a well organized structure, you and your team will be able to work hand in hand.
  • Well-documented: Every part of the starter kit is document so you don’t get lost.
  • Documentation Template: You will find already written documents for components to help you write. Everything stay inside Figma.
  • Lifetime update: You will get free updates forever. Amazing, right?



Get started with Core today?

Get your complete version of Core


For more information, check our official website: https://designsystemcore.com/
